cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I shine during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot!
💛 I give light and warmth to the Earth.
🌞 You see me almost every day!

cosmos.question: I am round and I go around the Sun. You live on me! What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I have lots of water.
🌎 People live on me.
🌱 Plants grow on me.

cosmos.question: I shine at night and sometimes look like a big cookie. What am I?

hints.text: 🐺 Werewolves like to look at me
🌑 I change shape every night.
🌝 I orbit the Earth.

cosmos.question: I am a hot, giant ball of gas that makes light. I am very far away, but you can still see me at night. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle in the sky.
🌌 I am part of a galaxy.
🔥 I am like a sun, but far away.

cosmos.question: I am a cold, rocky planet that goes around the Sun, but I am much smaller than Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 Sometimes people visit me.
🔴 I am red!
🤖 Robots have roamed on my surface.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: ursa 🐻 I can be an animal or a person.
🔗 I am made up of many stars.
📜 Ancient people named me.

cosmos.question: I am the biggest planet in our solar system and have a big red spot. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I am a giant gas planet.
🪐 I have many moons.
🔴 My great red spot is a giant storm.

cosmos.question: I am a huge group of stars, dust, and gas held together by gravity. Our solar system is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 I am very, very big!
🌌 I contain billions of stars.
🥛 My name sounds like a drink made of milk.

cosmos.question: I am a ringed planet that is less dense than water and could float (but I'm too big!). What am I?

hints.text: 💍 I am known for my beautiful rings.
💨 I am made mostly of gas.
🪐 My rings are made of ice and rock.

cosmos.question: I am a shooting star, burning bright as I zoom through the atmosphere. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I'm a small piece of space debris.
🔥 I create a streak of light.
🌠 People make wishes when they see me.

food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Think about what monkeys love to eat.
💛 I am a long, curved fruit.
🏃 You can slip on my peel!

food.question: I am round and red or green. I grow on trees, and some doctors say an/one a day keeps them away. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on trees in orchards.
🍎 I can be used to make juice.
🥧 I'm a popular ingredient in pies.

food.question: I am long and orange, and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
🐰 Bugs Bunny likes me!
👀 Eating me can help you see better.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me or pour me on cereal. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 You get me from an animal on a farm.
🥛 I am often served cold.
🍪 I taste good with cookies.

food.question: I am small and green. I grow in a pod. You might eat me with butter. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am a vegetable.
🟢 I am the same color as grass.
🥄 I'm often served as a side dish.

food.question: I am made from flour, water, and yeast, and baked in an oven. You can make sandwiches with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I am a staple food in many countries.
🔥 I need to be cooked to be edible.
🥪 You can spread butter or jam on me.

food.question: I am a juicy fruit that grows in bunches. I can be green, red, or purple. I am used to make juice and raisins. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow on vines.
🍷 I can be fermented into wine.
🧺 I am often found in fruit baskets.

food.question: I am made of corn and popped with heat, and often eaten at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I am a very popular snack.
🌽 My main ingredient is a vegetable.
🎬 People often enjoy me while watching movies.

food.question: I am a yellow fruit with a bumpy skin and a crown. I taste sweet and tangy. Pirates used to eat me to stay healthy at sea. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a prickly outside and a juicy inside.
🏝️ I grow in tropical climates.
⚓ I was important for sailors a long time ago.

food.question: I am a vegetable with many layers. I can make you cry when you chop me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I have a strong smell.
🔪 I'm a common ingredient in many recipes.
😭 Cutting me can cause tears.
